name: Bluedot
description: Bluedot provides an AI-powered note-taking and meeting recording solution for platforms like Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams.
longDescription: Bluedot is an AI-driven platform designed to streamline meeting productivity by automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing discussions on platforms like Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams. Its mission is to save time and enhance collaboration by eliminating manual note-taking and integrating seamlessly with tools like CRMs and project management systems. The platform serves professionals, recruiters, and teams by generating accurate transcripts, actionable summaries, and automated follow-ups, allowing users to focus on conversations rather than administrative tasks. Trusted by over 50,000 companies, Bluedot emphasizes data privacy and offers a non-intrusive, bot-free experience. It caters to a wide range of users, from solo entrepreneurs to Fortune 500 companies, helping them build a transparent and accountable record-first culture.
features: Bluedot automatically records and transcribes meetings on Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams, ensuring accurate capture of every word for later review.
The AI-powered note generator creates concise summaries and action items, saving users time and improving meeting outcomes.
Users can edit Microsoft Teams recordings by adjusting the transcript, allowing seamless trimming or removal of unwanted content.
The platform integrates with CRMs, Notion, and other tools to automate updates and streamline workflows.
Bluedot’s screen recorder Chrome extension enables easy recording and sharing of screen content with teammates.
AI-generated meeting highlights allow users to clip and share key moments for quick reference or collaboration.
The platform supports transcription in over 100 languages, making it ideal for global teams.
Bluedot’s video hosting feature organizes recordings in one searchable hub, enhancing accessibility and team collaboration.
Annotation and time-based commenting tools let users add context to specific parts of recordings for better clarity.
The Chrome Audio Capture extension records high-quality audio from any compatible device, ensuring clear meeting documentation.

faqs.question: What platforms does Bluedot support for meeting recording?
faqs.answer: Bluedot supports Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams, enabling seamless recording and transcription on these platforms.

faqs.question: Is Bluedot’s AI note-taking feature bot-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bluedot operates without bots, providing a non-intrusive experience that integrates directly with your meeting platform.

faqs.question: Can Bluedot integrate with my existing tools?
faqs.answer: Bluedot integrates with CRMs, Notion, and project management systems to automate updates and streamline workflows.

faqs.question: How accurate are Bluedot’s transcriptions?
faqs.answer: Bluedot delivers 99% accurate transcriptions, ensuring reliable documentation of meetings and conversations.

faqs.question: Does Bluedot offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bluedot provides a free Chrome extension and a free plan for users to access core features with limited usage.

faqs.question: Can I edit recordings with Bluedot?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bluedot’s AI-powered video editor allows users to trim or edit recordings by modifying the transcript.

faqs.question: How does Bluedot ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: Bluedot prioritizes data privacy, ensuring all recordings and transcriptions remain secure and private for users.

faqs.question: Is Bluedot suitable for recruitment processes?
faqs.answer: Bluedot streamlines recruitment by transcribing interviews, generating AI notes, and updating applicant tracking systems automatically.
